alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 24 at 11:52PM EDT until August 25 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Geauga County in northeastern Ohio... Lake County in northeastern Ohio... Ashtabula County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 1245 AM EDT. * At 1152 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 24 miles northwest of Fairport Harbor to 12 miles northwest of Timberlake to 9 miles north of Lakewood, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Painesville, Ashtabula, Willowick, Conneaut, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Mentor, Willoughby, Eastlake, Geneva, Madison, North Kingsville, Perry, Orwell, Andover, Timberlake, Lakeline, Chesterland and Wickliffe. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
